extensionDescription.message: Reclaim Your Digital Footprint: Erase Tracking Parameters from Your Webpages.

infoDescription.message: URL Parameter Eraser removes tracking parameters from the current page URL. It also rewrites links containing tracking parameters and adds a purple dashed outline.

funcDescription.message: You can click the icon to open the interface. In the interface, the 'Settings' option allows you to customize which tracking parameters to filter or unfilter. Currently, exact match (case-insensitive) and ^ prefix filtering are supported (e.g., entering ^utm will filter utm_source, utm_campaign, etc.). You can also set the style for filtered links. You can disable dynamic monitoring to stop URL Parameter Eraser from monitoring changes on this page, freeing up some performance. Furthermore, you can disable all features to stop URL Parameter Eraser from processing any links on this domain.

infoPrivacyDescription.message: This extension does not collect or store user browse history or other personal information. It also doesn't incorporate any third-party programs, and all settings are saved in the user's local browser.

infoContact.message: If you have any questions, please email 2012cjz@gmail.com.

dynamicMonitoringCheckbox.message: Disable dynamic monitoring for this domain

allFunctionCheckbox.message: Disable all features for this domain

optionsDomainPlaceholder.message: e.g. google.com, leave blank for all

optionsTempMessage.message: ‚ö†Ô∏èüì¢ The current version has rewritten the format and storage method of custom parameters to facilitate future updates. The storage location is still in your local browser, but if browser sync is enabled, your custom parameters can be applied across devices.
